reviews.review_msg: Amanda was very nice and approachable however, her lectures were pointless as they were directly from the textbook. She needed to provide her opinion, examples, and just generally interest students in the topic instead of reading fast through the slides. Her online tutorials were pointless and it had too many assignments. Her tests were fair.
Ansley is good peoples. Warm and caring about students.
Funny and hella cool. I got of profs this term. Approachable. Take her if you can.
Pescitelli is good but sometimes not helpful. Super strict guidelines and didnt like my paper even though i put alot of effort in.
One of the best professors ever, cares about students and offers help at any time. Can't be more thankful for such a great and caring prof

I was worried about this class not crim major but Yercich is really kind & helpful. Easy to approach with questions. Straight forward assignments but you need to put in the work to pass. Assignments are midterm easy, presentation simple, paper doesnt seem to bad, final & Yercich offered an extra credit assignment after the midterm.
